test_cases.Expected Result: Users without the 'Utente Anagrafica' role cannot access Anagrafica UI or data; appropriate authorization errors or UI restrictions are enforced.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers role-based access denial for non-Anagrafica users; does not cover escalation paths or audit logging verification.

test_cases.Title: CreatePerson_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_create a new person record

Steps.Step Description: Launch the Anagrafica application and log in with valid backoffice credentials (user: backoffice_user, pwd: Passw0rd!).
Steps.Expected Result: Anagrafica application main dashboard is displayed and user is authenticated.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Nuovo Anagrafica' (New Record) section via the main menu.
Steps.Expected Result: New Record form is displayed with fields: First Name, Last Name, Date of Birth, Tax Code, Address, Email, Phone and Save/Cancel buttons.

Steps.Step Description: Populate the form with valid data: First Name: 'Mario', Last Name: 'Rossi', DOB: '1980-05-10', Tax Code: 'RSSMRA80E10H501X', Address: 'Via Roma 1, Milano', Email: 'mario.rossi@example.com', Phone: '+390212345678'.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields accept the input and no inline validation errors are shown.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Save' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A success confirmation message appears (e.g., 'Anagrafica salvata con successo') and the newly created record is listed in the search results or details view.

Steps.Step Description: Search for the created record using the Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X' from the Anagrafica search page.
Steps.Expected Result: The search returns the newly created record with correct displayed values for all fields entered.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1) Test user account with backoffice privileges exists. 2) Database is accessible and test environment is reset to a known state. 3) No existing record with Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X' is present.
test_cases.Dataset: Backoffice credentials; sample person data: Mario Rossi, RSSMRA80E10H501X, mario.rossi@example.com
test_cases.Expected Result: New person record is created and persisted in the system; record retrievable via search with all entered fields matching.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers basic create and immediate retrieval; does not cover integration with external Tax Code validation service or audit trail verification.

test_cases.Title: EditPerson_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_update an existing person record

Steps.Step Description: Log in to Anagrafica Backoffice with valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in and main dashboard is visible.

Steps.Step Description: Search and open details for an existing person record with Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X'.
Steps.Expected Result: Person details page opens showing current attributes.

Steps.Step Description: Click 'Edit' to enable form fields, change Email to 'm.rossi+edit@example.com' and Phone to '+390219999999'.
Steps.Expected Result: Fields become editable and accept the new values without inline validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Click 'Save' to persist changes.
Steps.Expected Result: A success message is displayed and details view shows the updated Email and Phone.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a search by Tax Code and verify stored values.
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns the record and shows Email = 'm.rossi+edit@example.com' and Phone = '+390219999999'.

test_cases.Preconditions: An existing person record with Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X' is present (created by TC-AN-001 or seeded).
test_cases.Dataset: Existing record Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X'; updated email and phone values.
test_cases.Expected Result: Record updates are saved and displayed correctly; no data corruption occurs.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates field-level edit operations and persistence; does not validate concurrent edit conflict resolution.

test_cases.Title: DeletePerson_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_remove a person record

Steps.Step Description: Log in to Anagrafica Backoffice as an authorized user.
Steps.Expected Result: User is authenticated and can access person records.

Steps.Step Description: Search for the person record with Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X' and open details.
Steps.Expected Result: Person details are displayed for the specified Tax Code.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Delete' action and confirm the deletion in the confirmation dialog.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation dialog is shown with details (e.g., Tax Code, Name) and options Confirm/Cancel.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm deletion.
Steps.Expected Result: A success notification is displayed (e.g., 'Anagrafica eliminata con successo') and the record is removed from listing.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to search for the deleted Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X'.
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns no results and an appropriate 'no records found' message is shown.

test_cases.Preconditions: An existing person record with Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X' is present and user has delete permissions.
test_cases.Dataset: Existing record Tax Code 'RSSMRA80E10H501X'; backoffice_user credentials
test_cases.Expected Result: Record is deleted and cannot be retrieved via search; deletion confirmation and audit logging (if present) triggered.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers logical deletion via UI; physical purge or archival processes not covered.

test_cases.Title: SearchPerson_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_search by multiple criteria

Steps.Step Description: Log in to Anagrafica Backoffice.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in and search interface accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Open the search page and enter partial last name 'Ross' and select DOB range from '1970-01-01' to '1990-12-31'.
Steps.Expected Result: Search filter inputs accept values and allow combination of criteria.

Steps.Step Description: Click 'Search' to execute the query.
Steps.Expected Result: Results list is displayed filtered by partial last name and DOB range; records match both criteria.

Steps.Step Description: Refine search by selecting a specific municipality or address fragment 'Milano' and re-run search.
Steps.Expected Result: Results list further narrows to records that also contain 'Milano' in address field.

Steps.Step Description: Clear filters and perform an empty search to list all records (or first page of results).
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns the default listing (pagination applied) and UI shows reset filters state.

test_cases.Preconditions: Dataset contains multiple person records that match the search criteria (including records with last name 'Rossi' and address 'Milano').
test_cases.Dataset: Multiple seeded person records with varied names, DOBs and addresses
test_cases.Expected Result: Search/filter functionality returns correct results based on combined criteria and supports clearing filters and pagination.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates UI level search and filtering; performance under large datasets not covered.

test_cases.Title: ValidationMandatoryFields_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_mandatory fields validation on create

Steps.Step Description: Log in to Anagrafica Backoffice and open the New Record form.
Steps.Expected Result: New Record form displays with required field indicators (e.g., asterisk) for mandatory fields.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to save with all mandatory fields empty and click 'Save'.
Steps.Expected Result: Client-side or server-side validation prevents save; inline error messages are displayed for each mandatory field (e.g., 'First Name is required').

Steps.Step Description: Enter only First Name 'Anna' and click 'Save'.
Steps.Expected Result: Validation errors remain for other mandatory fields; only the entered field is accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Enter invalid Email value 'not-an-email' and invalid Tax Code format 'INVALID' along with other mandatory fields, then click 'Save'.
Steps.Expected Result: Validation highlights incorrect formats for Email and Tax Code with descriptive messages (e.g., 'Formato email non valido').

Steps.Step Description: Correct values to valid formats and click 'Save'.
Steps.Expected Result: Record saves successfully after all mandatory fields are present and valid.

test_cases.Preconditions: User logged in and New Record form accessible.
test_cases.Dataset: Scenarios: empty form; partially filled form; invalid email 'not-an-email'; invalid tax code 'INVALID'; final valid dataset.
test_cases.Expected Result: Mandatory fields and format validations prevent invalid save attempts and provide clear error messages; valid data allows persistence.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers client-side and server-side mandatory and basic format validations; does not include exhaustive Tax Code checksum validation or external service checks.

test_cases.Title: DuplicatePrevention_XXX_Anagrafica_Anagrafica_TEST_Computer_prevent duplicate records by Tax Code

Steps.Step Description: Login to Anagrafica Backoffice and ensure a record exists with Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y'.
Steps.Expected Result: Record with Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y' is present in the system.

Steps.Step Description: Open New Record form and attempt to create a new record using the same Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y' but different name.
Steps.Expected Result: System detects duplicate Tax Code during input or on save and displays a duplicate warning or error (e.g., 'Tax Code already exists').

Steps.Step Description: Try to bypass client validation and submit duplicate via direct request (if test environment allows) or re-run save after client-side prevention.
Steps.Expected Result: Server-side validation rejects duplicate creation (HTTP 4xx or application error) and no duplicate record is created in the database.

Steps.Step Description: Search for Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y' and verify only the original record exists.
Steps.Expected Result: Only original record is returned; no duplicate entries present.

test_cases.Preconditions: An initial record with Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y' exists and tester has access to attempt new record creation.
test_cases.Dataset: Existing Tax Code 'PLCNDR90A01H501Y'; new attempt using same Tax Code
test_cases.Expected Result: System prevents creation of duplicate records by Tax Code via client and server validations; data integrity maintained.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates duplicate prevention on Tax Code; other duplicate heuristics (name+DOB) not covered.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_all_preconditions_met

Steps.Step Description: Ensure Actor is logged into the Backoffice application with credentials that have navigation and modification rights for Brand Spain; open Backoffice and navigate to Manifestazioni search page.
Steps.Expected Result: Backoffice is open and the Actor is logged in; Manifestazioni search page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a search that returns a populated list of Manifestazioni for Brand Spain (use a Manifestazione that is already profiled in Brand Spain).
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns at least one Manifestazione which belongs to Brand Spain and is listed in results.

Steps.Step Description: Select the target Manifestazione from the results to open its edit/details page.
Steps.Expected Result: Manifestazione detail/edit page is displayed for the selected Manifestazione; fields are editable.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the 'Internazionale' (International) field and set it to 'Yes' (or check the checkbox) then save changes.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Internazionale' field accepts the change; save operation completes without errors and confirmation message is shown.

Steps.Step Description: Reload or re-open the same Manifestazione and verify the 'Internazionale' field value.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Internazionale' field remains set to 'Yes' after reload; change persisted in the system.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is logged into the application; B. Actor is enabled for navigation within Brand Spain; C. Actor is enabled to modify within Brand Spain; D. The Manifestazione is correctly profiled in Brand Spain; E. A search has been performed and the Manifestazioni list is populated.
test_cases.Dataset: User: backoffice_spain_editor@example.com / valid password; Manifestazione ID: MNT-ES-100 (profiled in Brand Spain)
test_cases.Expected Result: When all preconditions are met the Actor can successfully set the 'Internazionale' field to Yes and the change is persisted.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates successful update flow when all preconditions are satisfied; does not cover API-level validation or audit log verification.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_actor_not_logged_in

Steps.Step Description: Start Backoffice application without logging in and navigate directly to the Manifestazioni search URL or to the edit page of a Manifestazione (attempt direct access by URL).
Steps.Expected Result: Application redirects to the login page or shows an authentication required message.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access or load the Manifestazione edit page (direct link) without valid session.
Steps.Expected Result: Access is denied; user is not allowed to view or edit Manifestazione details and is prompted to authenticate.

Steps.Step Description: Try to perform any modification (e.g., change 'Internazionale' via UI or API) while unauthenticated.
Steps.Expected Result: Modification is blocked; API returns 401/403 or UI prevents save and shows an authentication/authorization error.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is NOT logged into the application (other preconditions may be true but authentication is missing).
test_cases.Dataset: No session token; direct Manifestazione URL: /manifestazione/edit/MNT-ES-100
test_cases.Expected Result: System prevents unauthenticated users from accessing edit functionality and from setting 'Internazionale'; authentication is required.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers unauthenticated access denial; does not cover detailed login flow.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_no_navigation_rights_brand_spain

Steps.Step Description: Log in with Actor credentials that are valid in the system but not enabled for navigation within Brand Spain (profile has no Brand Spain navigation permission).
Steps.Expected Result: Actor is logged in successfully; UI does not display Brand Spain navigation options or Brand Spain content.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a search scoped to Brand Spain or try to list Manifestazioni for Brand Spain.
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns no Brand Spain results or system displays a message indicating insufficient privileges or empty results due to scope restrictions.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to open a Manifestazione known to be profiled in Brand Spain via direct link.
Steps.Expected Result: Access is denied or the Manifestazione detail/edit page is not accessible; the Actor cannot reach the edit view to change 'Internazionale'.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is logged in; B. Actor is NOT enabled for navigation within Brand Spain; other preconditions may be valid.
test_cases.Dataset: User: backoffice_no_nav_spain@example.com / valid password; Manifestazione ID: MNT-ES-101
test_cases.Expected Result: Actor without Brand Spain navigation rights cannot view or select Manifestazioni for Brand Spain and thus cannot set the 'Internazionale' field.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates behavior when navigation permission for Brand Spain is missing; does not verify permission management UI.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_no_modification_rights_brand_spain

Steps.Step Description: Log in with Actor credentials that have navigation rights for Brand Spain but do NOT have modification rights (read-only role) for Brand Spain.
Steps.Expected Result: Actor is logged in and can navigate to Brand Spain and view Manifestazioni but editing controls are not available.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a search that lists Manifestazioni and open the details page of a Manifestazione profiled in Brand Spain.
Steps.Expected Result: Manifestazione details are displayed in read-only mode; edit controls (including the 'Internazionale' toggle) are disabled or not present.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to change the 'Internazionale' field or press the Save button.
Steps.Expected Result: System prevents changes: UI does not allow toggling the field or save attempt returns an authorization error; no modification is persisted.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is logged in; B. Actor is enabled for navigation within Brand Spain; C. Actor is NOT enabled to modify within Brand Spain; D. Manifestazione is profiled in Brand Spain; E. Search performed and list populated.
test_cases.Dataset: User: backoffice_spain_viewer@example.com / valid password; Manifestazione ID: MNT-ES-102
test_cases.Expected Result: Actor without modification rights cannot change the 'Internazionale' field; UI enforces read-only behavior and no change is applied.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Verifies enforcement of modification permissions for Brand Spain; does not test permission assignment flows.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_manifestazione_not_profiled_in_brand_spain

Steps.Step Description: Log in with Actor credentials that have navigation and modification rights for Brand Spain.
Steps.Expected Result: Actor is logged in and can navigate within Brand Spain.

Steps.Step Description: Search for a Manifestazione that is NOT profiled in Brand Spain (belongs to another brand or lacks Brand Spain profile).
Steps.Expected Result: Search returns the Manifestazione (if global search) or returns no results for Brand Spain contextual search; the Manifestazione is identified as not profiled in Brand Spain.

Steps.Step Description: Open the Manifestazione detail/edit page and inspect the availability of the 'Internazionale' field for Brand Spain context.
Steps.Expected Result: If the Manifestazione is not profiled in Brand Spain, the system either does not allow setting 'Internazionale' for Brand Spain (field absent/disabled) or displays a message indicating the Manifestazione must be profiled in Brand Spain first.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to set 'Internazionale' and save.
Steps.Expected Result: Save is blocked or the change applies only if the system auto-profiles (if not allowed, an error/validation message is shown). No unintended changes should be persisted for Brand Spain.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is logged in; B. Actor is enabled for navigation and modification within Brand Spain; C. Target Manifestazione is NOT profiled in Brand Spain; E. Search performed (if applicable).
test_cases.Dataset: User: backoffice_spain_editor@example.com; Manifestazione ID: MNT-ES-200 (not profiled in Brand Spain)
test_cases.Expected Result: System prevents setting 'Internazionale' for a Manifestazione that is not profiled in Brand Spain and informs the Actor that profiling is required before this field can be set.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests behavior when the Manifestazione lacks Brand Spain profiling; does not validate automatic profiling flows if they exist.

test_cases.Title: SetInternazionale_XXX_PRECONDIZIONI_Backoffice_TEST_Desktop_search_list_not_populated

Steps.Step Description: Log in with Actor credentials valid for Brand Spain navigation and modification.
Steps.Expected Result: Actor is logged in and can navigate to the Manifestazioni search page.

Steps.Step Description: Do NOT perform a search (leave filters empty) or perform a search that returns zero results so that the Manifestazioni list is empty.
Steps.Expected Result: Manifestazioni list is empty and no items are available to select.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to select or open a Manifestazione to set 'Internazionale' when the list is empty.
Steps.Expected Result: System prevents selection; UI prompts the Actor to perform a search or display a message 'No results' and no edit action is possible.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a valid search that populates the list and then repeat the set 'Internazionale' steps to confirm normal behavior.
Steps.Expected Result: After a valid search the list is populated and Actor can select an item and set 'Internazionale' as in the positive scenario.

test_cases.Preconditions: A. Actor is logged in; B. Actor enabled for navigation and modification within Brand Spain; D. No Manifestazione selected because search was not executed or returned no results.
test_cases.Dataset: User: backoffice_spain_editor@example.com; empty search criteria
test_cases.Expected Result: When the Manifestazioni list is not populated the Actor cannot set 'Internazionale' until a search is performed and results are available; system guides the Actor to populate the list.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers behavior when the list is empty; does not test search filter combinations exhaustively.

test_cases.Title: SearchManifestazioni_XXX_REQ_MANIFESTAZIONI_ManifestazioniWeb_TEST_Computer_ReturnsResultsForBrandSpain

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application URL and navigate to the login page.
Steps.Expected Result: The web application login page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Log in with valid credentials (username: test.user@example.com, password: Test@1234).
Steps.Expected Result: User is authenticated and redirected to the application dashboard/home page.

Steps.Step Description: From the dashboard, navigate to the 'Manifestazioni' section of the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Manifestazioni' section/page is displayed with search and filter controls visible.

Steps.Step Description: Set the Brand filter to 'Spagna' (Spain).
Steps.Expected Result: Brand filter shows 'Spagna' selected and the UI indicates the filter is active.

Steps.Step Description: Set the 'Internazionale' filter to 'No'.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Internazionale' filter is set to 'No' and UI shows the filter is applied.

Steps.Step Description: In the search field, enter a valid existing event name known to be Brand=Spagna and Internazionale=No, e.g., 'FeriaLocal2025', and click the 'Search' button.
Steps.Expected Result: Search request is submitted and client displays search progress/indicator.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the search results list returned by the client.
Steps.Expected Result: One or more results are displayed that match the search term, belong to Brand 'Spagna', and have 'Internazionale' set to 'No'. Each result shows event name, brand, and 'Internazionale' attribute.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1) Test user account (test.user@example.com) exists and has access to 'Manifestazioni'. 2) At least one Manifestazione record exists with Brand='Spagna' and Internazionale='No' (e.g., event name 'FeriaLocal2025'). 3) Network connectivity to the application is available. 4) Tester is on a supported browser version.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials: test.user@example.com / Test@1234; Existing event: 'FeriaLocal2025' (Brand: Spagna, Internazionale: No)
test_cases.Expected Result: Client returns one or more search results for the specified event; all returned results belong to Brand 'Spagna' and have 'Internazionale' = 'No'.
test_cases._polarion: Percorso base – Manifestazione su cui il campo 'Internazionale' risulta impostato a 'No'
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the happy path search for Brand=Spagna with Internazionale=No. Does not cover pagination, sorting, or export features.

test_cases.Title: FilterInternazionaleNo_XXX_REQ_MANIFESTAZIONI_ManifestazioniWeb_TEST_Computer_FilterReturnsOnlyLocalEvents

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application and log in with valid credentials (test.user@example.com / Test@1234).
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and the dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Manifestazioni' section.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Manifestazioni' page is displayed with filters and search box visible.

Steps.Step Description: Leave the search box empty and set the Brand filter to 'Spagna'.
Steps.Expected Result: Brand filter set to 'Spagna'; result list is refreshed or ready to be filtered.

Steps.Step Description: Apply the 'Internazionale' filter with value 'No' and execute search/refresh results.
Steps.Expected Result: Filter is applied and the result list refreshes showing events that match Brand='Spagna' and Internazionale='No'.

Steps.Step Description: Inspect each item in the returned results list and open 2 different result detail pages (if more than 2 results exist).
Steps.Expected Result: Every listed item displays Brand='Spagna' and a field or indicator showing Internazionale='No'. Detail pages for opened items also show Internazionale='No'. No items with Internazionale='Yes' are present in the list.

Steps.Step Description: Validate that UI badges/filters reflect the active filter state (Brand 'Spagna' and Internazionale 'No') and that a result count is shown (if applicable).
Steps.Expected Result: UI clearly indicates active filters and the result count equals the number of displayed items; only local (Non-international) events for Spain are present.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1) Valid user logged in. 2) The database contains multiple Manifestazione records including both Internazionale='Yes' and 'No' for Brand='Spagna'. 3) Tester has permission to view event details.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials: test.user@example.com / Test@1234; Sample records: FeriaLocal2025 (Internazionale=No), ExpoInternational2025 (Internazionale=Yes)
test_cases.Expected Result: Result list and opened details only show events where Brand='Spagna' and Internazionale='No'. Events with Internazionale='Yes' are excluded from results.
test_cases._polarion: Percorso base – Manifestazione su cui il campo 'Internazionale' risulta impostato a 'No'
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates filter behavior for Internazionale flag and Brand. Does not cover combined sorting, multi-brand selection, or performance under large datasets.

test_cases.Title: SearchManifestazioni_NoMatches_XXX_REQ_MANIFESTAZIONI_ManifestazioniWeb_TEST_Computer_NoResultsMessageDisplayed

Steps.Step Description: Open the application and log in with valid credentials (test.user@example.com / Test@1234).
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in and dashboard is visible.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Manifestazioni' section.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Manifestazioni' page is displayed with search and filter options.

Steps.Step Description: Set the Brand filter to 'Spagna' and set 'Internazionale' to 'No'.
Steps.Expected Result: Filters are applied showing Brand 'Spagna' and Internazionale 'No'.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a search term that has no matching events for the selected filters, e.g., 'NonExistentEventXYZ', and click 'Search'.
Steps.Expected Result: Search is executed and the client processes the query.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the results area after search completes.
Steps.Expected Result: The application displays a clear 'No results found' message or equivalent; no event items are shown. Filters remain applied and user can clear or adjust filters/search.

test_cases.Preconditions: 1) Valid user logged in. 2) No event exists with the name 'NonExistentEventXYZ' for Brand='Spagna' and Internazionale='No'.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials: test.user@example.com / Test@1234; Search term: NonExistentEventXYZ
test_cases.Expected Result: The client shows a 'No results found' message when no events match Brand='Spagna', Internazionale='No' and the search term. Filters remain editable.
test_cases._polarion: Percorso base – Manifestazione su cui il campo 'Internazionale' risulta impostato a 'No'
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers behavior when queries yield zero results. Does not include suggestions, autocorrect, or search-as-you-type behaviors.
